779750.name: The spy who shot me™ Demo
779750.description:
The spy who shot me™ is a comedy arcade-like FPS. Served up in a 90's retro style. Take the roll of super spy Agent7! As he fights against the evil S.C.U.M.


***********************************************************************************
Features

-> Arcade style fast gameplay,
-> Traditional Retro Army humor,
-> Hordes of enemies to combat,
-> Unique run and gun gameplay,
-> Vehicle action,
-> Weapon Mods,
-> Lovely pointy polygons,

***********************************************************************************



"There you are! I've been waiting... I want you to test out this new software we've developed. It's top secret mind you" - Mother
779750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
